title: Enga Veettu Pillai
overview: Ramu is an innocent son of a rich landlord who is afraid of his brother-in-law Narendran and his whiplash. To escape from his punishments, Ramu leaves his house and his look-alike replaces him.  Enga Veettu Pillai is a remake of NTRâ€™s Ramudu Bheemudu 1963 Telugu movie. Both are directed by same director Tapi Chanakya
